entry.title: Photos Post 17: Croatia
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 6 Photos from 1976-0909 Sightseeing, Dubrovnik, Croatia, the very first Photos from Croatia, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 6 moderate resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 6 Photos in the smallest gallery: Croatia 1976.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, July 2023

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, July 2023

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month new Photos were uploaded to 3 Pūjas as follows.
(i) 1997-0504 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 1 medium/high resolution uploaded, link Italy 1997.
(ii) 1998-0905 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link Italy 1998.
(iii) 2002-032 Birthday Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link India 2002.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 34
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 7 Photos from the special event 1978-0317 First World Maritime Day, London, UK have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 5 high resolutions and 2 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 7 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1978.
[Note: 1 Photo was previously dated 1976-0000 (year not sure) and 4 were previously mixed up with the 1984-0000 IMO Photo.]
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
